Updated November     pm



Wayne Sleep felt  over his short stature and even considered taking hormone pills in a desperate bid to grow taller PERIOD

The 5ft 2in ballet dancer rose through the ranks of the Royal Ballet in the 1960s after becoming the shortest male dancer ever to be into the Royal Ballet School  but hes admitted his rise to stardom was tough because he was overlooked in favour of his taller peers PERIOD

He told The Telegraph newspaper Sleep she said to me PERIOD Whats this I hear about you wanting to take pills You cant PERIOD Its not been scientifically proven PERIOD Youll just have to turn twice as fast as everyone else and jump twice as high PERIOD Now get on with it I didnt disobey.The Crown did very well I thought PERIOD But why didnt they phone me .. PERIOD As soon as she came on in The Crown the audience went Aahhhh In fact it was an intake of breath from  people.Well Im glad he wasnt so good as me

Originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD

Never miss our photos stories and videos PERIOD
title: Wayne Sleep considered taking hormone pills to grow taller | Entertainment | msuexponent.com
